item.description:
Come celebrate the longest day of the year with an evening hike in Myles Standish State Forest.  The hike will be through the center of the forest in Wildlife Management areas. The hike will include a mix of trail and forest road walking through some of the lesser used areas of the park.  The hike will be a moderately hilly in places, will pass by some ponds, numerous fields and both white pine and pine barren habitats. 

I expect the hike to be 2+ hours and five mile range. We will be finishing in twilight, so bring a headlamp or flashlight. Dogs are welcome if they are leashed.
item.how_to_find_us: Parking Lot # 2 on Upper College Pond Rd

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Summer Solstice Hike
